name: RSpec
description: Testing framework for Ruby/Ruby on Rails. Tests include clear statements explaining how the application is expected to behave. RSpec is currently the default choice and is used for all existing applications within the department. https://github.com/rspec/rspec-rails

name: Minitest 2
description: Developers should aim to use RSpec for consistency with existing applications
column6: however Minitest is a valid alternative and can be used given reasonable justification https://github.com/seattlerb/minitest

name: PyTest 3
description: The pytest framework makes it easy to write small tests
column6: yet scales to support complex functional testing for applications and libraries https://pypi.org/project/pytest/

name: XUnit
description: Currently there are not .NET frameworks in use at LAA so XUnit is not applicable for the languages we use.

name: AWS Lambda
description: In trial for teams X Y and Z

name: Test Driven Development
description: The preferred way of driving development.
